name: Text slide with a list
content:
Party wi-fi

  • SSID: PartyWifi
  • Password: hunter2

The internet connection here is very slow. Please use sparingly, especially during compos.

name: Schedule
content:
Thursday

08:00 Wake-Up Chill: Ambient DJ Set + Coffee
08:30 Breakfast + Badge Hacking Session
09:00 Shader Showdown Qualifiers
09:30 Talk: "Retro Hardware Demo Tricks (C64/Amiga)"
10:00 Fast Compo Theme Release (1h graphics + music)
10:30 Lunch Break + Pixel Picnic
11:00 Pixel Art Workshop (with guest artist)
11:30 Music Compo: Tracked, Chiptune, and Streaming
12:00 1-Hour Fast Compo Deadline & Showing
12:30 Demo Screening: "Best of the 2010s"
13:00 Shader Showdown Finals
13:30 Dinner Time + BBQ Jam
14:00 Wild Compo (video, hardware demos, etc.)
14:30 Graphics Compo (hand-drawn, pixel, photo)
15:00 Demo Compo (PC, Oldschool, Size-limited)
15:30 Live Performance: Chiptune + VJ Set
16:00 Results & Prize Giving
